definition: to introduce (sb)/(esp.) to present to the emperor

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: He visited Vallombrosa when he was introduced to Galileo in Fiesole.
sentences.chinese: 他被引见给尚在菲耶索的伽利略时曾经去过那里。

sentences.english: On that day, due to Yihe's introduction, I firstly met Haizi.
sentences.chinese: 那一天，因骆一禾引见，我与海子初次相识。

sentences.english: Director of the present to force the actors also get rid of eery salesman boasts suspicion.
sentences.chinese: 导演引见的给力，演员们也摆脱不了老王卖瓜的嫌疑。

sentences.english: I'd like to stand in if you introduce me.
sentences.chinese: 如果你给我作引见，我愿意加入。

sentences.english: The example to introduce grass carp baked method of making Wanzhou.
sentences.chinese: 本幢救嗽草鱼为例引见万州烤鱼地制造办法。

sentences.english: But if you have watched it already, I don't think it is necessary to discribe it for you.
sentences.chinese: 但是假如你看了话，我以为我不需求再向你引见它了。

sentences.english: Could you introduce to me the man over there?
sentences.chinese: 把那边那个人给我引见一下好吗？

sentences.english: In a party, he introduced me to his manager.
sentences.chinese: 在聚会上，他把我引见给了司理。

sentences.english: Introduced to the warden wearing a Song Jiang Kui.
sentences.chinese: 戴监狱长把李逵引见给了宋江。

sentences.english: Then Wang Ping crossed the river and submitted to Zhao Zilong, who took the defector to Xuande.
sentences.chinese: 王平渡汉水来投赵云，云引见玄德。

sentences.english: Allow me, Sir, to introduce you to my fellow-travellers.
sentences.chinese: 先生，请容许我向你引见我的旅伴。

sentences.english: Introductions in advance by the enemy of the white tea NE release of radiation.
sentences.chinese: 事先经冤家引见了NE放辐射美白茶。

sentences.english: Today I will introduce you one of the wonders of the world, the Great Wall.
sentences.chinese: 今天，自己将向你引见地世界，长城地奇观之一。

sentences.english: The following is the science and technology as the people under the present semiconductor laser.
sentences.chinese: 下面由正明科技为大家引见下半导体激光器。

sentences.english: I met a girl who ------ you -Oh, that may be my t…
sentences.chinese: 求一篇自我引见的英语作文。

sentences.english: Only Ju must also be called on, Ju is in order to see you to Zhang Jun, please.
sentences.chinese: 就是我也能求见的，请让我把您引见给张君。
